https://tmrev.io/movie/370244-André's Eyes 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1ZRmNpZXH38jwBY5UKmUQxi9Mmh.jpg André's Eyes is an experimental docudrama in which the actual family members themselves participate in the recreation of their own story. Set in a small village in the Portuguese countryside, the film follows the struggle of a divorced father to keep his family together after his youngest son is taken away from them and placed in a foster family. André's Eyes
